response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity to own a product that exceeds your expectations at a highly competitive rate.
